title: Example Workflow Step SG noCode Form
description: This is an example workflow step schema that demonstrates common field types and configurations

stringField.title: Text Input
stringField.description: A basic text input field. Example: 'some-value'

enumField.title: Dropdown Selection
enumField.description:
A dropdown field with predefined options:
- 'Option 1': First choice
- 'Option 2': Second choice

enumFieldSimple.title: Simple Dropdown
enumFieldSimple.description: A simple dropdown without separate display names

numberField.title: Numeric Input
numberField.description: A field that accepts numeric values. Example: 42

optionalTextField.title: Optional Text
optionalTextField.description: An optional text field that isn't required

additionalParams.title: Additional Parameters
additionalParams.description: Any additional parameters as a string. Example: '--param1 value1 --param2 value2'
